item.title: Canadian Natural Resources Limited to Release 2017 Budget Details
item.description: [Marketwired] - Canadian Natural Resources Limited will release its 2017 budget details on Thursday, December 15, 2016. The news release will provide forward looking information on the Company's 2017 operating year.
